sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { Box } from "@mui/system"; import image from '../Books/images/book.png' import Card from '@mui/material/Card'; import { Typography } from "@mui/material"; function Book(props){ const [cuurentCartItem, setCurrentItem] = React.useState({}) //let filterarray = data.fileter() return( {props.currentBook.bookName} {props.currentBook.author} 4.3 * {props.currentBook.price} dssdd "discountPrice": 550, "bookImage": null, "_id": "616fde2b74dbc1000e41e658", "admin_user_id": "616fdcc474dbc1000e41e655", "bookName": "Data Structures", "author": "Billy Adam", "quantity": 10, "price": 620, "createdAt": "2021-10-20T09:15:23.268Z", "updatedAt": "2022-02-08T11:07:56.306Z", "__v": 0 ) } export default Book
